description:
"Pixel Game Maker Series JEWELiNX is a retro-flavored falling object puzzle game.
It's a puzzle game with a simple rule: if you put two blocks of the same type in a row or on top of each other, they disappear.
However, if two blocks are easily erased, a penalty gauge will accumulate and a block in the way will appear.
It's a little different from the traditional falling puzzle games, where you have to pile up the blocks in order to keep them from disappearing.

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch.
name: Pixel Game Maker Series JEWELiNX
intro: The second installment in the fictional "GAME BUDDY" portable game series! A retro-style Falling block puzzle!
